doc: [Docs] It's not clear in the docs that "session" and "check" must be added

As forums user **gris** [brought up here](https://forums.meteor.com/t/session-package/22276/2), it's not clear that `session` must be added in order to use it.  Other packages make a very clear distinction.  This probably wasn't updated when the packages were no longer default starting in (I think) 1.2.
The same omission seems to be on `check`.
